pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Images // Computes maximum response from Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Images using spatial and voxel wise spline based Bayesian model. This is an implementation of the methods described in Schmid (2011) doi:10.1109/TMI.2011.2109733 "Voxel-Based Adaptive Spatio- Temporal Modelling of Perfusion Cardiovascular MRI". IEEE TMI 30(7) p. 1305 - 1313.
